Factsheet

Developer:
Shared Memory
Based in Chicago, IL
Release date:
2023
Platforms:
Not yet announced
Website:
animalwell.net
Regular Price:
Not yet announced

Description

Animal Well is a video game about exploring a forsaken labyrinth and unravelling its secrets. You’ll collect items, solve puzzles, and try to survive what lurks in the dark.

History

I've been spending the last 10 years working as an engineer at various game studios, and during the past four, Animal Well has been percolating in the background. I wanted to see if I could take gameplay mechanics from survival horror games and apply them to something with a less severe art style. I also wanted to create a game that is not dependent on updates or the internet, but is instead pre-loaded with secrets that may take years to uncover. Like a forgotten artifact, lost in time. I ended up making the engine from scratch so I could have complete control over everything that went into the shipped binary. It will be my first independent release.

Features

  • Dense, surreal, puzzle box world, with attention paid to every detail
  • The main game is just the beginning. People will be discovering hidden puzzles for years
  • Encounter creatures and sights both beautiful and demented -- assess what is safe and dangerous
  • Reimagines what pixel art can look like when taking full advantage of modern hardware

About Shared Memory

Boilerplate
Shared Memory Is the company that was formed for the purpose of releasing Animal Well. It aims to craft complete experiences that will be playable long after the world loses its internet connection.
